metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1263 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: [NULL pointer dereference in kvm_dirty_ring_push] Qiuhao Li, Gaoning Pan, and Yongkang Jia discovered that the kvm implementation in the Linux kernel did not handle releasing a virtual cpu properly. A local attacker in a guest VM coud possibly use this to cause a denial of service (host system crash).

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Qiuhao Li, Gaoning Pan, and Yongkang Jia
